アゲぽよ～！ Ｆｌ∞ｔｙだよー！\n今、彼ピとデートにきてま～す！:
Agepo! It's Fleighty!
He's on a date with Pi right now!
はーい、彼ピも一緒に～、ぴすぴーす！: Okay, he's coming with us, Pispi!
あの……今日は、わざわざ\nここまで付き合ってくれてあざまるです。:
Um... Today, I went out of my way to...
I'm sorry you've come this far with me.
別に構わないけど……頼みたいことがあるって、なんなんだ？: I don't really mind, but... what do you want me to do for you?
実は、手伝ってほしい生配信があるのです！: Actually, there's a live feed I want you to help me with!
それは……じゃじゃん！\n『学園で彼ピと制服デートしてみた』という企画です！:
That's... Ta-dah!
I went on a uniform date with him at school!
……ええと、学園のショッピングモールを案内するのに、\nデートシチュで配信をした:
...Umm, to show you around the school's shopping mall...
I wanted to broadcast it in a date situation.
ですが、フルートには生まれてこの方、\n彼ピと呼べる相手がおりません。:
However, in the flute, there was a person who had been born
I don't have anyone I can call Pi.
ですので、信頼できる男性であるあなたに\nこうして協力を仰いだというわけなんです:
So, as a man I can trust
That's how I asked for your cooperation.
なるほど……でも実を言うと、\n俺はあまりフルートの配信には詳しくないんだが……:
I see... But to tell the truth...
I don't know much about flute distribution, but...
フルートは、ギャルのバイブスを表現しています。\nギャルの文化を……『ぽよ』を！:
The flute represents the vibes of the gal.
The culture of gals... the "poyo"!
自由で、いつだってポジティブで……\n好きなものをためらわずに全身で好きだって言:
Free, always positive...
She didn't hesitate to tell me that she liked what she liked with her whole body...
格好悪い行動は大嫌いで、仲間のことはとても大事で……: I hate uncool behavior, and I really care about my friends...
そんな、何ものにも囚われない、\n自由なギャルのバイブスが大好きなんですっ！:
That's, I'm not trapped by anything,
I love the Vibes of Free Gals!
そして何より……とってもカワイイ！ そんな『ギャル』の\n『ぽよ』を、フルートは:
And most of all... She's so cute! Such a gal.
The flute shares 'Poyo' with everyone!
な、なるほど、よく分からないが、\nその熱い気持ちだけは伝わってきた。:
I-I see, I don't really get it,
That passionate feeling was the only thing I could feel.
……わかったよ。信頼して呼んでもらったからには、\n全力でフルートに協力させても:
...Fine. Since you called me by my trust,
I'll do everything in my power to help the flute...!
あざまるです！\nさすがです、嬉ぽよです！:
It's a joke!
Impressive, I'm so happy!
……やっぱりよく分からないが、\nさっそく配信を始めるとするか。:
...I still don't really get it,
Guess I'll start broadcasting right away.
――そして今に至る。: ――And that brings us to the present.
次は～、とーってもアゲぽよなお店を紹介するね！: Next up, I'll introduce you to a really old-fashioned place!
このお店は～、自分好みにスイーツをデコることができて、\nと～っても、アゲアゲな:
This shop~ was able to decorate sweets to your liking,
But I'm still bald-faced!
ほらほら、彼ピも食べて食べて。\nはい、あ～ん。:
Come on, hey, he's eating too.
Yes, ahhh.
ふふっ、ほっぺにクリームついちゃってる。\n取ってあげるから、動いちゃだめー！:
Hehe, there's cream on your cheek.
I'll get it for you, so don't move!
なになに……Ｆｌ∞ｔｙと彼ピ、仲良しでカワイイ！: What the heck... Fleighty and he are so close and cute!
うわ～、あざまるです！\nほめられちゃったよ～、えへへ……:
Wow, that's mean!
That was a compliment~ Ehehe...
――そうして企画は予定通り進行していく。: And so, the project proceeded as planned.
フル……Ｆｌ∞ｔｙ、\nずいぶんと楽しそうだな。:
Fl...Fleighty,
You look like you're having a lot of fun.
えへっ、彼ピと一緒だからかも！\nアゲアゲ～って感じ！:
Eheh, maybe it's because he's with Pi!
It's like I'm swallowed up!
そうか、なんだか俺も、アガってきた気がするよ。: I see. I feel like I'm starting to get tired of it too.
フルートと一緒だと、こっちまで元気がもらえる気がする。\n本当にギャル文化が好き:
I feel like being with a flute will cheer me up, too.
She must really like gal culture.
ガチめのガチ！？ やったー！\nんじゃんじゃ、次の店に行ってみよー！:
A rock-hard rock?! Yay!
Well then, let's go to the next store!
さあ、次のコメントはぁ～……え？: Now, as for the next comment... Huh?
（デバイスの画面をずっと見て、どうしたんだろう？）: (What's wrong with staring at the device the whole time?)
どれどれ……\n『フルート？ 何してるんだ？』:
Let's see...
"A flute? What're you doing?"
（あれ、なんで本名を……）: (Huh? Why's she using her real name...?)
――って思っていたら、フルートのデバイスに着信音。: Just as I'm thinking that, I hear a ringtone on my flute device.
……ご、ごめ～ん、みんな！\n急用が入っちゃったから、今日の配信はお～しまい！:
...S-Sorry, everyone!
I have urgent business to attend to, so today's broadcast is over!
見てくれて、どうもあざまる～！\nまったね～！:
I can't believe you're watching me!
It's been a while!
――視聴者達が動揺する中、配信は唐突に打ち切られたのだった。: —While the viewers were shaken, the stream was abruptly cut off.
たまたまお父さん、配信を見ちゃったんだって……: Dad just happened to see the broadcast...
見た目とか言葉遣いとか、家にいた頃と全然違うのに、\nすぐフルートだって気づいて:
Her appearance and manner of speech were completely different from when she was at home
I realized it was a flute right away... and he said a lot of harsh things to me.
そんな不良みたいな格好は止めろ、彼氏とは別れろ。\n学生は勉強だけしていればいい:
Stop looking like a delinquent and break up with your boyfriend.
All students have to do is study.
今すぐ、こんな馬鹿げた『遊び』は全部やめろ……だそうです。: Stop with all this stupid 'playing' right now...
……ああ、もう、こんな時間ですね。\nそろそろ、帰らないといけません……:
...Ah, it's already this late.
I have to go home soon...
%usernameusernameuserna%さん……\n今日は、本当にどうも:
%usernameusernameuserna%...
Thank you very much for your help today.
いや、いい。気にするな。: No, it's fine. Don't worry about it.
その……お父さんを説得したりはできないのか？: Umm... Can't you persuade your father?
……って、やれるならもうやってるよな、すまん。: ...Wait, if you can do it, you've already done it, right? Sorry.
いえ……うちのお父さん、昔から厳しかったので。\nそれに学園での生活費、援助して:
No... My dad's always been strict.
Besides, I'm in a position to receive support for my school's living expenses...
元々、魔が差した……みたいな感じだったんです。\n学園に入って親元を離れたから、:
It was originally a demon...or something like that.
I left my parents after entering the academy, so I thought I'd try broadcasting it...
みんなと一緒に大好きな『ギャル文化』を、\nシェアしあえたらすごく楽しいだろうな:
Along with everyone else, I wanted to see my beloved "gal culture"
I thought it would be really fun to share it with each other...
それで気づいたらこんなにも観てもらえるようになってて……\nだからバレるのも、時:
And before I knew it, she was watching me so much...
So I thought it was only a matter of time before they found out.
そりゃそうですよね……好きなことを好きなだけ続けられるなんて、\nそんな都合のい:
That's true... To be able to keep doing whatever you want,
There's no way something so convenient could happen.
なので、バレたら『はい、おしまい！ 短い間だったけど、\nあー楽しかったー！』で:
So if they found out, I'd say, "Okay, it's over! It's only been a short time, but...
Ah, that was fun!' I thought it was over.
その時が来た。それだけなんです。\nだからギャル配信者Ｆｌ∞ｔｙは、ここでおしま:
The time has come. That's all.
That's why the gal streamer Fleighty ends here.
それは……\nそれは違うと思う。:
That's...
I don't think that's right.
引退なんてダメだ……撤回だ！\nここでやめたら、絶対にフルートは後悔する！:
Retirement is out of the question... I take it back!
If I stop now, the flute will definitely regret it!
むしろ、お父さんに認めさせてやろう！: If anything, I'll make Dad acknowledge me!
え、み、認めさせる……？ でも……: Huh? I-I'll make you admit it...? But...
フルートはこのままやめていいのか？\n『ギャル配信者Ｆｌ∞ｔｙ』……好きなんだろ:
Can I stop playing the flute like this?
"Gal Streamer Fleighty"... You like it, don't you?!
物分かりのいいふりして、理不尽にも従順で……\nそんなんがお前の目指した『ギャル:
Pretending to be understanding, being unreasonably obedient...
Is that the "gal" you were aiming for?!
本当は好きなのに嘘ついて、不自由なのに自由だって笑って、\nもうダメだってあっさ:
She lied when she actually liked him, and laughed when she said she was free despite being inconvenienced
I can't take it anymore! Is that what it means to give up so easily?!
俺は、ギャル文化ってのに詳しくはない……\nでも少なくともフルートの『好き』は本:
I don't know much about gal culture...
But at the very least, I can tell that the flute's "like" is serious!!
もう一度言うぞ、フルート。このままやめていいのか？\n今までの『好き』を、全部た:
I'll say it again, flute. Can I stop now?
Is it okay to end all the "love" I've had up until now with just memories...?
このまま『Ｆｌ∞ｔｙ』じゃなくなっても、本当にいいのか！？: Is it really okay for me to stop being Fleighty like this?!
嫌です……！\n嫌……嫌、嫌……っ！ 嫌ですッ！！:
I don't want to...!
No... No, no...! No!!
やめたくないっ！ こんなに楽しいこと見つけたの、\n初めてなんですっ！ やめたく:
I don't want to stop! I've found something so fun,
This is my first time! I don't want to stop...!!
うぐっ……ぐすっ……！\n大好き……ひっぐ……！ なん……です……！:
Ugh... *sniffle*...!
I love you...hic...! What...are you...!?
俺とどっちが好き？: Which do you like better, me or me?
俺はただ、答えのわかっていたことを聞いただけだ。: All I did was ask what I knew the answer to.
はい……%usernameusernameuserna%さんのおかげで、\nちゃ:
Yes... Thanks to %usernameusernameuserna%,
I was able to say how I really feel...
ふふっ、もう……こんなときに、そんな冗談……\nでも……元気アゲぽよです。:
Hehe, geez... Such a joke at a time like this...
But... I'm full of energy.
……さて、提案がある。\n聞いてくれないか？:
...Now then, I have a proposal.
Will you listen to me?
そうだ。言ったろ、お父さんに認めさせてやろうって。\n『続けていい』って言わせる:
That's right. Didn't I tell you? I'll make your father acknowledge you.
Let them say, 'You can keep going.' In our own way.
アゲぽよ～！ Ｆｌ∞ｔｙだよー！\n今日から、新しいシリーズ企画をはじめるよ～！:
Agepo! It's Fleighty!
Starting today, we're going to start a new series!
その名もぉ～、じゃじゃん！\n『ギャルが先生してみた』！ パチパチパチ～！:
It's called... Ta-da!
'Gal's trying to be a teacher'! Clap clap clap~!
簡単にいうと、Ｆｌ∞ｔｙがこの生配信を通して、\nみんなにお勉強教えちゃいまーす:
To put it simply, Fleighty was using this live feed
I'll teach everyone how to study!
あ、今Ｆｌ∞ｔｙには無理！ とか思わなかった～？\nこれでもかなり勉強ガチってる:
Oh, didn't you think that Fleighty couldn't do it just now?
I'm pretty serious about my studies!
それじゃあまずは、数学から――\n: Well then, let's start with math――
（すごいな……『教える』となると、ちゃんとその分野を根底から\n理解していないと:
(Amazing... When it comes to 'teaching,' I'll be able to properly understand that field from the bottom of my heart
I have to understand. That's what I'm doing.)
（普段から勉強はしていると聞いていたが、\nこのレベルだと教員免許も取れるんじゃ:
(I'd heard she usually studied, but...
At this level, wouldn't you be able to get a teaching license?)
（コメントも『わかりやすい』とか『頭良すぎ』とか、\n肯定的なものがほとんどだ）:
(The comments were also "easy to understand" and "too smart"
Most of them positive.)
それじゃ今日のお勉強はここまで！\nまた次の配信で――:
Well then, that's all for today's study!
See you on the next broadcast—
……少し、聞いていただけますか。: ...Could you listen to me for a moment?
ごめん。少しだけ……話したいことがあるんだ。: Sorry. There's something I want to talk to you about.
彼女は、今日の配信を……いや、今までの配信すべてを、\n心から真剣に向き合ってや:
She watched today's broadcast... No, all the broadcasts up until now
I've come to take this seriously from the bottom of my heart.
親の言いつけもちゃんと守って、勉強も日々の生活も、\n全部きちんと真面目にやって:
She did what her parents told her to do, and she studied and lived her daily life
I'm taking everything seriously. I'll be by your side as a witness.
だから……どうか、\n本気で取り組んでいる彼女のことを見守ってあげてください！:
So... please,
Please watch over her as she gets serious!
い、いえ……むしろ、ああ言っていただけて、フルートは……: N-No... If anything, hearing you say that makes the flute...
そのとき、フルートのスマートデバイスに着信音。\nこれはもしかして……:
Just then, I hear a ringtone on my flute's smart device.
Could this be...
さっきの……見てたんだな。: She must have seen that... earlier.
……俺が出るか？\n最後のアレもあるし……:
...Will I come out?
There's that last one, too...
い、いえっ、フルートが出ます！: N-No, the flute is coming out!
（そう言いつつも、手が震えてるな……）: (Even though she says that, her hands are shaking...)
%usernameusernameuserna%さん……！\nお父さん、ギャル配:
%usernameusernameuserna%...!
Dad, you can continue the gal broadcast...!
あっ、お父さん、ごめんなさい……！\nうん、うんうん……え？:
Ah, Dad, I'm sorry...!
Yeah, yeah, yeah... Huh?
そう言って、彼女のスマートデバイスがこちらに差し出される。: She holds out her smart device to me.
（一体、何の用だ……？\nまさか彼氏と勘違いされてるから、別れろって話か？）:
(What the hell do you want...?)
Don't tell me she's telling me to break up with her because she thinks I'm her boyfriend?)
……なぜ私があの子に厳しいか、分かるかい？: ...Do you know why I'm so strict with her?
私はね、自分で言うのも何だが、人生設計をしくじっていてね。\nもちろん、妻と娘に:
I've messed up my life plan, if I do say so myself.
Of course, that doesn't include the fact that I met my wife and daughter...
もっと勉強して、いい学校に、いい企業に入っていれば、\n家族をもっと幸せにできた:
If only I'd studied harder, gone to a good school, and joined a good company...
Even now, I regret that I could have made my family happier.
もしかして、それであなたはフルートにあんな厳しいことを？: Could that be why you were so strict with the flute?
あの子には誰よりも幸せになってほしいと願っている。\nだから、分かるね？:
I want her to be happier than anyone else.
That's why you know, right?
もし今の活動を続けて娘の人生が狂うようなことがあれば、\n『責任』は取ってもらう:
If you continue your current activities and your daughter's life is ruined,
You'll have to take responsibility.
（今の……フルートにも聞こえてたみたいだな……）: (Looks like the flute heard that, too...)
無論、『責任』の意味は、君の想像の通りだ。\nまさかその気もないのに、娘をたきつ:
Of course, the meaning of "responsibility" is as you imagine.
Don't tell me you didn't hit your daughter when you had no intention of doing so?
い、いえ！ 分かりました！\n何かあれば、娘さんは必ず俺が幸せにしますっ！！:
N-No! Understood!
If anything happens, I'll make your daughter happy!!
（いや、今の流れ、それ以外の答え許されてなかったろ！）: (No, I wasn't allowed to answer anything else!)
今後もあの子を頼む。\nしかし……娘があんな顔で笑うとはな……:
Please take care of her from now on.
Still... I didn't expect my daughter to smile like that...
勢いで勝手に答えてしまってごめん。\n後でちゃんと訂正を……:
I'm sorry for answering on my own.
I'll make sure to correct myself later...
フルートは別に、お父さんの言ったこと、\nおけまるなんですが……:
The flute wasn't really what Dad had said
I'm sorry, but...
ああ、いえ！ なんでもありません！\nさあ、次の企画を考えましょう！:
Oh, no! It's nothing!
Come on, let's think of our next project!
不束者ですが――\nこれからもフルートとＦｌ∞ｔｙをよろしくお願いします♪:
I'm inexperienced, but—
Please take care of Flute and Fleighty from now on♪
